Posts.Content: On Sep 26, 2011 5:26 PM joeys_mom wrote: I am scared and still don't know what i want to do..Â  I know I am having a mastectomy on my right breast on wednesday.. Should I've have them do a dbl mastectomy and reconstruct all at the same time .. Or get healed and follow treatment on my right breast first.. I have large breast.. that may be an issue.. thank you sabine.. I had a mastectomy two years ago. I too have large breasts. So now that I am thinking of having the reconstruction it seems I have to have quite a big reduction on the remaining breast too. I wish that I had had it all done in one go. But that is just my opinion.
Posts.Title: I cant decide and it is getting close..
